Detailed Description

This class provides access to the set of functions which any user could use to access the Bluevia Payment Service functionality

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Creates a PaymentClient object to be able to do payments through the gSDP

cancelAuthorization (  ) 

Merchant can use this operation instead of payment, to cancel a previously authorized purchase.

getAccessToken ( $  oauth_verifier,
$  request_token = null 
)

Gets the AccessToken. Additionally the client stores the access token for previous payment operations.

Parameters:
string $oauth_verifier The code returned by oAuth Application
string $request_token If the application did not the manual redirection, the request token object with Zend_Oauth_Token_Request type returned by the getRequestToken function must be provided here
See also:
getRequestToken from OAuth.php
Returns:
array ('REQUEST_TOKEN', 'ACCESS_TOKEN')
getPaymentStatus ( $  transactionId  ) 

The function getPaymentStatus allows to request the status of a previous payment operation

Parameters:
string $transactionId Id of the previous payment operation
Returns:
array ('transactionStatus','transactionStatusDescription')
getRequestToken ( $  amount,
$  currency,
$  serviceID,
$  serviceName,
$  callback_url = null,
$  autoredirect = true 
)

Gets the RequestToken as first step of the OAuth process in order to make a payment operation.

Parameters:
int $amount Amount to be charged, it may be an economic amount or a number of 'virtual units' (points, tickets, etc) (mandatory).
string $currency Type of currency which corresponds with the amount above, following ISO 4217 (mandatory).
string $serviceID
string $serviceName
string $callback_url
bool $autoredirect
Returns:
Zend_Oauth_Token_Request The RequestToken
Exceptions:
BlueviaClient_Exception_Parameters 
BlueviaClient_Exception_Client 
payment ( $  amount,
$  currency,
$  endpoint = null,
$  correlator = null 
)

Allows to request a charge to the account indicated by the end user identifier

Parameters:
int $amount Amount to be charged, it may be an economic amount or a number of 'virtual units' (points, tickets, etc) (mandatory).
string $currency Type of currency which corresponds with the amount above, following ISO 4217 (mandatory).
Returns:
array ('transactionId','transactionStatus','transactionStatusDescription') or Error
